name: Iron Man Noir
text: Suit up — Response: After you change to this form, ready your identity. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, for each [[expedition ]]obligation in your play area, deal 1 damage to your identity or place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Tony Stark
text: Action: Put a set-aside [[expedition ]]obligation into play (limit once per round). Seeking for a cure — Response: After you change to this form, place 1 clue counter on an obligation or remove 1 threat from a scheme (limit once per round).

name: War Machine Noir
text: Enters play with 3 ammo counters on it. Action: Remove 1 ammo counter from War Machine Noir → deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Dealing with Hazards
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, place 1 clue counter on an [[expedition ]]obligation. “This is handy. We do need a rope.”

name: Muscular Intervention
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, place 1 clue counter on an [[expedition ]]obligation. “We live in a world full of violence!” —Tony

name: Chain Reaction
text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Until the end of the round, each time you or War Machine Noir defeat an enemy or remove the last threat from a scheme, draw 1 card and place 1 clue counter on an [[expedition ]]obligation. Martial art strategy and tactics of espionage...

name: Go! Go! Go!
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, remove 2 threat from a scheme. “Nazis, I hate Nazis!” -Tony

name: Marvels
text: Action: Choose: • Place 3 clue counters among [[expedition ]]obligations in play. • Discard an obligation in your play area.

name: Virgil Munsey
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Virgil Munsey → the next thwart this phase removes 1 additional threat. “I am Virgil Munsey, Tony’s chronicler for the amazing Marvels’ magazine.”

name: Jarvis
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Jarvis → heal 1 damage from Tony Stark. Draw 1 card. “All you need is a cure.”

name: Pepper Potts
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Pepper Potts → The next attack this phase deals 2 additional damage. “I never loved you either.”

name: Jade Mask
text:
Permanent.
Your hero gets +1 THW and your basic thwarts ignore the crisis icon ([crisis]).
Your alter-ego gets +1 REC.

name: Mark II Armor
text:
Permanent.
You get +1 hand size while in hero form.
You get -1 hand size while in alter-ego form.

name: Neptune Trident
text:
Permanent. Restricted.
Your hero gets +1 ATK and your basic attacks gain overkill.
Your alter-ego gets +1 REC.

name: Moto-Armor
text: Permanent. Hero Resource: Exhaust Moto-Armor → generate a [wild] resource. I would like to have one." —Hawkeye

name: Orichalque
text:
Permanent.
Your hero gets +1 DEF and gains retaliate 1.
Your alter-ego gets +1 REC.
